codingQuestions.text: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.
codingQuestions.returnDescription: Array of two integers representing the indices

codingQuestions.text: Write a function to reverse a string. The input is given as a string. Your function should return the reversed string.
constraints: s consists of printable ASCII characters
